Text: seems to work well. haven't checked for virus. the software itself appears to stink though. can't even import pdf files for edit among other bad things

Dr Chandra, the reason you can't edit PDF files in InDesign is because that's not what the software was designed to do.  You'd need Acrobat Professional for that.  InDesign is a cracking bit of kit and is fast becoming industry standard.
Yeah Winamp and Bulletproof Ftp Server stink too. Can't open pdf's with those either!
